Package com.intellij.ide.util.treeView

Interface NodeOptions

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ProjectViewSettings, ViewSettings
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractProjectTreeStructure, FavoritesTreeStructure, FavoritesViewSettings, NodeOptions.Immutable, ProjectTreeStructure, ProjectViewSettings.Delegate, ProjectViewSettings.Immutable, ViewSettings.Immutable

    public interface NodeOptions
    Common view settings for trees like the project view and packages view tree.
    See Also:
    ViewSettings

      • isCompactDirectories

        default boolean isCompactDirectories()
        Returns:
        true if directories in a tree should be merged if possible

      • isShowLibraryContents

        default boolean isShowLibraryContents()
        Gets the value of the "Show/Hide Library Contents" option.
        Returns:
        true if the library contents are shown, false otherwise.
